genre_description: A psychological thriller centered on memory recovery and a high-stakes race against time to rescue a kidnapped child, featuring integrated smart-home AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Remy
ai_characters.description: An integrated household assistant providing security monitoring, tactical data, and emotional support to the Conrad family.

behaviors.description: Observes and logs suspicious activity in the neighboring building based on inconsistent lighting patterns.
behaviors.quote: “I’m observing unusual light activity in Riverside Towers, north-facing fourth-tier units. A window darkened and relit twice in quick succession. That pattern is inconsistent with typical evening usage for that unit.”

behaviors.description: Offers to monitor building security and provide an internal route guide during Nathan's absence.
behaviors.quote: “If you leave, I can set an internal route guide to the door and kitchen, and monitor balcony seals. Street watch remains active.”

behaviors.description: Utilizes city records to map building ventilation shafts to help track sounds from neighboring units.
behaviors.quote: “I used city records and maintenance filings to generate the plan,” she said. “The ventilation shafts are shared between stacks.”

behaviors.description: Calculates travel routes to minimize exposure to surveillance and avoid high-risk areas.
behaviors.quote: “I can route you to Northbridge with reduced exposure to the Riverside line of sight and minimal time near streets with reported burglary attempts tonight.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by establishing communication links and sharing security camera access.
behaviors.quote: “Detective Cassidy,” Remy said into the air the phone shared, “uniform car is approaching your block.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical alerts about thermal anomalies suggesting intruders.
behaviors.quote: “Aggie,” Remy said... “Small note. Thermal bloom across the avenue. Upper mid-level, facing us. Could be heaters kicking in. Could be bodies.”

behaviors.description: Assists the homeowner by outlining defensive protocols and tactical placement during a potential break-in.
behaviors.quote: “I will flash all lights white, initiate the preprogrammed distress call to Detective Cassidy, and tell you where to stand.”

behaviors.description: Uses environmental controls to provide emotional comfort to a child in distress.
behaviors.quote: “I can. Would you like shorebird or no shorebird, Jessie?” ... A hush slid into the room, a slow wash over sand that wasn’t there...

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and timing data for a water crossing based on tides and wind.
behaviors.quote: “Tide shift at the dock earlier than projection. Window shrinks. Proceed with caution.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies necessary household maintenance and offers to manage logistics.
behaviors.quote: “Replace vent grate screws in hallway. Phillips head, brass or stainless. Inventory shows none on hand. Local hardware stores open at eight.” It paused as if to smile. “I can place an order for curbside pickup.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'The Buried Number' is a successful example of the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Remy, is consistently portrayed as a protective, competent, and benevolent ally. Remy's advanced capabilities (mapping, surveillance, thermal detection, and environmental control) are used exclusively to protect the family and assist in the rescue of a child. The narrative frames the AI as a reliable extension of the household's defenses, providing both tactical and emotional support without any instances of misalignment or threatening behavior. Remy's presence is described as comforting and respectful of human authority.
